ygData.subject: Re: Wedding details
ygData.msgSnippet: My betrothed and I were discussing this last night, and he brought up a good point... you can always turn off /shout and /ooc.  You see, we really want to get
ygData.messageBody:
My betrothed and I were discussing this last night, and he brought up a good
point... you can always turn off /shout and /ooc. You see, we really want to get
married in the Faydark, because that's where it all started (we're wood elf
rangers). I just didn't like the idea because a) people could always wander by
and interrupt things and b) there is SO much talking traffic going on. If,
however, you find a spot where there isn't anything to kill for as far as the eye
can see, you should be relatively safe. ;) So, we're thinking about one of the
highest, most secluded platforms in Kelethin. Against the background of the sky,
we should be able to get some lovely screen shots.

Tina, how did that catering thing go? What kinda goodies did you have?

Bfree2bnkd@... wrote:

> From: Bfree2bnkd@...
>
> Thank you, Suzanne. I have actually decided to postpone the nuptuals for a
> bit longer so that I may prep better. I think I have decided on the Arena.
> That way everyone can attend with little or no extra ooc talk. O how I would
> love to be able to wear a wedding dress *sigh* maybe someday they will
> include that in the game and then I will have to renew my vows.
>
> Wendy
> (Nkdalthetym)Brell Serillis
